section.title: Apache Forrest - org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.simplifiedDocbook Plugin
section.p: This plugin allows files written in the Simplified Docbook vocabulary to be included in an Apache Forrest site.

section.title: Supported Simplified Docbook Versions
section.warning: SDocbook support is not yet considered complete. However, it is certainly usable. If you find an element is not supported please raise an issue on the project issue tracker.
section.p: The following versions of SDocbook are supported. Other versions can be added, please raise an issue if you need additional support.
